name: Furries.EXE
description:
This game was first upload on Gamejolt.com on behalf of the furry fandom.

The game was made to show that Anti-Furries are the real threat, not the furries.

And because it is an EXE game all but 2 villains in the game are Creepypastas. The rest are Anti-Furries.

But only 1 of the villains you have to fight is not a villain, and his name is Krypto.EXE
